name: Dimensional Phaser Sprint 2
description:
I strongly recommend not to hit a wall when driving coz the crashing is a bit over the top.  When respawning from checkpoints, please wait until you touch the ground before moving.  So a lot of bugs i need to fix.

Camera phasing is disabled.  If you flip upside down just restart the game from the pause menu.  Trail effect is a bit broken so I need to fix that.  No AI for this sprint. Sounds are broken so need to fix those. 

W - Forwards

A - Left

S - Backwards/Brake

D - Right

R -  Respawn from last checkpoint

Esc - Pause

After you finish playing please take some time to answer the form :                                      https://forms.gle/TwYFY4W3FbTrT7wD9
